title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When a file is already open in the editor, selecting 'Open With...' and choosing a different type of editor from the available options does not have any effect.
EB: When a file is already open in the editor, selecting 'Open With...' and choosing a different type of editor from the available options should open a new editor with the selected type for the file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow the steps below:
1. Open the scripted resource editor example.
2. Create a new basic project.
3. Create a new file named 'test.xml'.
4. Open the file 'test.xml' in the Navigator.
5. Right-click on 'test.xml' and choose 'Open With...'.
6. Select 'Default Text Editor' from the list of options.
7. Verify that nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example is still active.

Expected Result:
A new editor should be opened for the file 'test.xml' with the selected 'Default Text Editor' type.
